title: My camera level framing hint is off by 1-2 degrees on my Pixel 4 XL.
content:
Hi!
Framing hint level on my camera is off by 1-2 degrees on my Pixel 4 XL. I have tried re-calibrating the compass from Google Maps and also deleted users information for the camera app but the problem remains.
My Pixel 3 XL doesn't have the same problem.
Is there any way to fix this issue or to calibrate the phone or camera sensors?
//Greg
